<p> IndexedFaceSet defines polygons using index lists corresponding to vertex coordinates. IndexedFaceSet is a geometry node containing a Coordinate|CoordinateDouble node, and can also contain Color|ColorRGBA, Normal and TextureCoordinate nodes. <i>Wikipedia:</i> see <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polygon" target="_blank">Polygon</a>. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#IndexedFaceSet" target="_blank">IndexedFaceSet</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/geometry3D.html" target="_blank">13 Geometry3D component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/geometry3D.html#Concepts" target="_blank">13.2 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/geometry3D.html#IndexedFaceSet" target="_blank">13.3.6 IndexedFaceSet</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter13PointsLinesFaces" target="_blank">Chapter 13 Points Lines Faces</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter06GeometryPointsLinesPolygons" target="_blank">Chapter 06 Geometry Points Lines Polygons</a> </li> </ul>
